[@kas](@RuNxm8SRujPcJx6GjtTQHp6hprAFv5voEkcvoAkB8Pk=.ed25519) 

Yeah, this has always been my hesitation about the current mentions. Maybe we could have a system where authors post *only* the ID and then the Markdown renderer on the client replaces that with the user's preferred nicknames? I don't think it'd be hard at all, it could work the same way we replace message mentions. As long as we have that, I think it would be trivial to use private nicknames.
